message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. I believe this product will bring you significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $10,000. Can you consider that?
